A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most disappointing movie-going experience of my life. I cannot imagine what movie the critics were watching when they gave this such a high positive score. It was worse than Attack of the Clones. The “humor” was for eight year olds. Leia can fly through space? Luke likes alien milk? Snoke is gone like he was nothing? Luke is gone like he was nothing? This was a total pile of horse crap and everyone involved should be embarrassed.
